EmailTemplate.name: Conservation Account Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to YETI! We are happy to inform you that our Conservation accounts have transitioned to the YETI Fundraising Team.
Effective 7/1/18, please send all inquiries to fundraising@yeti.com. Erin Cooper will be your direct point of contact moving forward.
We are committed to growing our current and future Conservation partnerships and look forward to serving you.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
The YETI Fundraising program exists to serve all qualified nonprofit organizations by providing a genuine unmatched customer experience. We strive to create a YETI presence with our brand and products, maximizing fundraising revenue for the nonprofit organizations we support. We are excited to work with you!
